item.description:
Yes, it has been ages since we've brunched.

So, if you're hankering to join for a last minute one..... see you tomorrow at Vlora.

Note...restaurant is garden level so may not be easily visible. Look for GNC and then look below it..voila.

Check out Vlora Web Page for menu, directions, as well as photos.

MBTA:
Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route
five (5) minute walk from
Green Line Copley Square

or

Green Line Arlington

or

Orange Line Back Bay

DRIVING DIRECTIONS:
Enter Boylston Street from Dartmouth Street...both streets are one ways
Parking is on Boylston St., Clarendon St., and Newbury St.
Check out Google to plan your route

PARKING:
Check out Best Parking or POVO or Parking Carma for nearby parking garages

Rules for Engagement:

Show up at 11 AM

Bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

Your feedback is appreciated so, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterwards.

I will arrive at 10:45AM to confirm seating and will welcome diners at the bar.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Vlora Brunch - Sunday September 27th 11 AM
